title: Summer Dress Concept
description: A realistic 3D summer dress created in Marvelous Designer with detailed cloth simulation. Perfect for e-commerce preview and design iteration.
process: This design began with hand-sketched concepts, evolved through multiple iterations in Marvelous Designer with real fabric physics, and was finalized with professional lighting and rendering in Blender.

title: Winter Coat Collection
description: Detailed 3D winter coat with realistic fabric draping and weathering effects. Demonstrates advanced texturing and cloth simulation techniques.
process: Created using advanced cloth simulation to capture natural fabric behavior. Multiple material layers were combined for realistic wrinkles and surface detail.

title: Formal Gown Series
description: High-end formal wear 3D models featuring intricate detailing, complex draping, and luxurious material rendering.
process: Each gown was meticulously crafted to capture the elegance of formal wear, with special attention to fabric flow and light interaction.

title: Athletic Wear Optimization
description: Game-ready athletic wear assets optimized for real-time rendering in game engines while maintaining visual quality.
process: Designed for performance and visual fidelity. Geometry was optimized for real-time engines without sacrificing detail. Rigging ensures smooth animation.

title: Game Character Outfit
description: Complete 3D outfit for game character, fully rigged and optimized for Unreal Engine.
process: Built specifically for game integration with attention to polygon count, texture resolution, and animation compatibility.

title: VR Fashion Experience
description: Fashion collection designed for immersive VR experiences with real-time rendering and interaction capabilities.
process: Created with VR constraints in mind, ensuring smooth performance while delivering immersive visual quality.

title: Luxury Collection Renders
description: High-end photorealistic renders of luxury fashion collection for brand marketing and e-commerce.
process: Each piece was rendered with professional lighting setups and post-processing to achieve photorealistic quality suitable for luxury marketing.

title: Marketing Campaign Imagery
description: Collection of campaign-ready images featuring 3D garments in styled environments for advertising and social media.
process: Designed to tell a story and evoke emotion while showcasing the garments. Careful composition and color grading for brand consistency.

title: Product Showcase Series
description: Studio-style product photography recreated with 3D rendering for consistent, high-quality e-commerce imagery.
process: Each render mimics professional product photography with controlled lighting and neutral backgrounds for maximum product focus.
